title: Jetbrain Plugin Changelog | Labuladong Algo Notes
content:
Jetbrain Plugin Changelog

labuladongOriginalAbout 731 words

Jetbrain Plugin Changelog

labuladongOriginalAbout 731 words
labuladong labuladong labuladong Original About 731 words About 731 words

Info

This page serves as the update log for the Jetbrain plugin. For a detailed user guide, refer to the Jetbrain Plugin Manual.

v3.1.0

Major Update

Supports local debugging of algorithm code in Java/C++/Python/JavaScript/Golang. For detailed configuration methods, see Jetbrain Plugin Manual.

v3.0.0

v2.0.3

v2.0.2

v2.0.0

v1.9.1

Major Bug Fixes

Compatibility Change

Compatibility of the plugin has changed to 2022.2+, meaning it no longer supports IDE versions below 2022.2. If you cannot update the plugin, please upgrade your IDE version.

v1.8.9

2024/6/29

Significant Improvement

Substantially improved the accuracy of multi-language solutions in the thought process.

2024/6/25

v1.8.8

v1.8.6

Major Bug Fixes

Due to cloudflare protection added to the English version of leetcode.com, previous network requests by the plugin were blocked, preventing normal login and usage. This update resolves the issue.

v1.8.4

Major Bug Fixes

Fixed the bug where it was sometimes impossible to open the plugin configuration page.

v1.8.1

Major Bug Fixes

Fixed the issue where the visual panel would unexpectedly redirect to the browser during loading in certain cases.

v1.8.0

Breaking Change

Discontinued support for Xiaoe and the old website, adapting to the new site labuladong.online. The method to unlock course-specific solutions in the plugin has changed, and the first chapter of the course provides a detailed introduction.

Major Update

Added an "Edit" button to the visual panel, allowing you to modify and run your solution code directly on the panel, making it easier to test your creative ideas:

v1.7.6

Major Bug Fixes

Fixed the bug where the latest 2023.3 IDE couldn't use the plugin after enabling the new UI.

v1.7.5

v1.7.3

Major Bug Fixes

Fixed the issue of visual panel style distortion.

v1.7.2

v1.7.0

v1.6.2
